Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Morgan
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine, due to street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute near 106th/Ewing
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express buses temp. rerouted EB: 106th, Ewing, 108th and Avenue H; WB: 112th, Avenue B, 108th, Ewing and 106th: near 06th/Ewing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 106th/Ewing, due to street blockage near 106th/Ewing.

Eastbound buses will operate via 106th, Ewing, 108th and Avenue H including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Westbound buses will operate via  112th, Avenue B, 108th, Ewing and 106th.

Allow extra travel time.
